title: Create and publish a new article via the admin workflow

requirements.text: Create a new long-form article (English) by adding a new entry to `frontend/src/content/articleTemplates.ts` so it can be loaded from the Admin Article Editor “Start from a Template” dropdown and then saved/published through the existing admin workflow.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/articleTemplates.ts` includes one new `ArticleTemplate` with a unique `slug`, `title`, `tags`, and non-empty Markdown `content`.
The Admin Article Editor page template selector lists the new template and successfully loads its title/slug/content/author/tags into the editor when selected.
All user-facing text inside the new article content is written in English.
The new template slug does not conflict with any existing template slugs and remains URL-safe (lowercase, hyphenated).

requirements.text: Ensure the created article can be published and appears publicly: after an admin saves and publishes an article created from the new template, it must show on the public Articles index (`/articles`) and the article detail page (`/articles/$slug`) must render successfully for anonymous visitors.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can: load the new template, click “Save” to create the article, then toggle publish to “Published” without errors.
As an anonymous (logged-out) visitor, `/articles` lists the newly published article in the results.
As an anonymous (logged-out) visitor, navigating to `/articles/<new-template-slug>` renders the article title and Markdown content without runtime errors.
If the new article includes Markdown images, they render correctly using the existing Markdown image support (no broken layout).

constraints: Keep all user-facing UI text in English.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn components).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; only add `backend/migration.mo` if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Do not introduce new routes/pages for the public site or admin.
Do not add third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity remains the only auth method).
Do not add external database or off-chain storage for articles.
